title: Natural gas consumption in the United States : 1995 to 2018
summary: Overall Consumption in trillion cubic feet has increased over the Year.
Consumption in trillion cubic feet is roughly constant from 2012 to 2017, and finally slightly increasing from 2017 to 2018.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2017 and 2018.
Maximum Consumption in trillion cubic feet, about 29.95 was reported at Year 2018
Minimum Consumption in trillion cubic feet about 25.54 was reached at Year 2012
min_summary: In general Consumption in trillion cubic feet has rose over the Year.
Consumption in trillion cubic feet is roughly constant from 2012 to 2017, and finally slightly increasing from 2017 to 2018.
